extendedInfo.description: CereProc has developed the world's most advanced text to speech technology. Our voices not only sound real, they have character, making them suitable for any application that requires speech output. This voice can synthesize:* Navigation directions from Google Navigation while driving* Twitter, Facebook and newsfeeds with iHearNetwork* Your favourite eBook from eBook reader apps* Your SMS with apps like Handcent SMS or Drive Carefully* and many other TTS-enabled appsPlease note that for some applications such as Google Navigation, we recommend installing on a device with at least a 1GHz processor.You can try Jess's voice for yourself, in the interactive demo on CereProc's homepage:http://www.cereproc.com

reviews.title: This is a great voice.
reviews.comment: This is a great voice. It can be a little choppy at points but in general it sounds good. Cereproc has great customer service. The voice stopped working with the latest Google Maps Navigation update. I emailed the developer and within hours I had a response and there was and update to the voice in the play store.
reviews.author: Maxwell Blakeney

reviews.title: Excellent Voice
reviews.comment: I have a few of the Cereproc voices and this one is my favorite.
reviews.author: Brice Hoke

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Its great. my phone is actually called Jess and i like northern accent so this app was perfect for me.
reviews.author: Hailo G

reviews.title: Good sound - needs rate control
reviews.comment: The app runs great and the voice sounds good and is easy to understand.   However the default speeds of normal and slow end up with the voice speaking like its rushed, or slow and choppy. I was able to get the voice to sound perfect using the rate control in the application itself (where u can test it and adjust rate/pitch).  There needs to be a way to make that rate and pitch control actually set the speed and tone of the voice. If that is how your supposed to set it, it doesn\'t work on my phone.
reviews.author: Scott Leister

reviews.title: Great TTS replacement.
reviews.comment: Unfortunately, it doesn\'t consistently work. For instance, while driving using the GPS, as soon as my GPS re-routes, it goes back to using the stock TTS voice. Using Android 2.3.6.
reviews.author: Joe Barrett
